title: 【1.2.5】红石电缆2更新至pr5b2！！！
author: huhu呼呼
txt_content:
本帖最后由 huhu呼呼 于 2012-5-24 18:07 编辑 

RedPower2                                                                                                                                                                       红石电缆2pr5b2作者： Eloraam  
                                                                                                                                                                                        

http://you.video.sina.com.cn/api/sinawebApi/outplayrefer.php/vid=77437862_1862281732_bUngSyE5C27K+l1lHz2stqkP7KQNt6nkgWy2uVqlIg1bQ0/XM5GeZdkE5yHQAtkEqDhAQ587dvku0R8/s.swf

原地址：http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=6pyrTM_aZQI 
                                                                                                                                                                                        
下载：
Single Player/Client Files:客户端[1.2.5] RedPower Core V2.0pr5b2
[1.2.5] RedPower Logic V2.0pr5b2 (Requires Core)
[1.2.5] RedPower Wiring V2.0pr5b2 (Requires Core)
[1.2.5] RedPower Lighting V2.0pr5b2 (Requires Core)
[1.2.5] RedPower World V2.0pr5b2 (Requires Core)
[1.2.5] RedPower Machine V2.0pr5b2 (Requires Core, World, Wiring)
[1.2.5] RedPower Control V2.0pr5b2 (Requires Core, Wiring)Server Files:服务端[1.2.5] RedPower Core Server V2.0pr5b2
[1.2.5] RedPower Logic Server V2.0pr5b2 (Requires Core)
[1.2.5] RedPower Wiring Server V2.0pr5b2 (Requires Core)
[1.2.5] RedPower Lighting Server V2.0pr5b2 (Requires Core)
[1.2.5] RedPower World Server V2.0pr5b2 (Requires Core)
[1.2.5] RedPower Machine Server V2.0pr5b2 (Requires Core, World, Wiring)
[1.2.5] RedPower Control Server V2.0pr5b2 (Requires Core, Wiring)
115快捷下载：

http://115.com/file/c28qixkk#
红石电缆pr5b2.zip



                                                                                                                                                                                   
更新内容：（求翻译帝）
New Features 新增
Added some achievements. 增加一些成就？
Support for Buildcraft oil. 管道模块支持了撸管mod的石油
Support for Railcraft/MCL minecarts. 支持高级铁路/MCL（？传送带？）的矿车？
Moss spreads. 苔石上的苔藓可以繁殖==（rp越来越跑题了）
Recycle fine wire, armor, tools.回收金属丝、铠甲、工具
Igniters can extinguish portals.点火器可以控制地狱门开启关闭
Independent output buffers for the Sorting Machine.
Added iron, tin, copper, silver nuggets.增加各种金属里
General Bug Fixes 修复BUG
IConnectRedstone is now respected by redwire (fix for Railcraft connection).
Make use of the new MCL getItemsDropped() for minecarts.
Fixed bottom of thermopile texture.
Fixed jitter when near bedrock.
Deployers using screwdrivers
Fixed bad linksize computation.
Fixed frame sky excursion.
Fixed frames leaving loaded chunks.
SSP volcanos now generate properly.
Carts crashing into transposers now have a draining delay.
Sorting machine no longer loses the column.
Items bumping the input of the sorting machine are correctly sorted.
Fixed HD texture animations on Frame Motors.
Fortune on gems.
Fixed bug in Assembler filling water buckets, etc.
Boot disks now spawn in dungeon chests.
Battery boxes drop contents when broken.
Rubber tree leaves had the wrong light opacity.
Placed rubber leaves no longer decay.
Change the FORTH boot disk rarity.
Nugget merge recipes in alloy furnace.
Added jungle wood microblocks.
Made diamond blocks harder to cut.
Added a workaround for people who insist on setting the world time backwards.
Fixed issues with Redbus IDs over 127
Control Changes 控制变化
Fixed KEY? 固定关键？
New Words: 0SP 2SWAP ( \ ” AT-XY
New words: >NAME NAME> DOES>
New words: U. / MOD U< U>
New words: PROBE TOP FREE
New words: IMMEDIATE LITERAL POSTPONE RECURSE
New Words: BLOCK FLUSH REVERT UPDATE LIST WIPE PP LOAD
WORDS no longer clobbers the TOS.
TIB no longer overwrites SCRATCH.
CPU: Fixed interpretation of the E flag.
CPU: Add unsigned divide support (C=0), fix divide bugs.
CPU: C and Z flags are no longer swapped.
CPU: Added unsigned multiply support (C=0)
CPU: Fixed the carry flag for SBC.
ERASE is now called FORGET
TIBFIND is now called ‘
CPU loader no longer crashes when loading from a disk >64k
TIMES can now be used as a compiling word.
Make ALLOT smarter
Attempt at fixing mac enter keys in Control.










谢谢看完                                                                                            

http://imgcache.qq.com/qzone/space_item/orig/1/67377.swf?id=www.meqzone.com&type=.swf

replies.txt_content: 挖...    这次更新了这么多东西丫...  谁能告诉我这客户端MOD和服务端MOD怎么安装...

replies.txt_content: 我去...电脑的那个我不知道怎么玩

replies.txt_content:
994523036 发表于 2012-5-21 16:04 
挖...    这次更新了这么多东西丫...  谁能告诉我这客户端MOD和服务端MOD怎么安装...
如果下115的请解压把里面的压缩包放到mods文件夹里
注意要Minecraft Forge Risugamis ModLoader 
不知道请下基础包（论坛有）

replies.author: craft
replies.txt_content:
额，我俩更新撞车了，虽然我是放在下载站论坛的~几乎同一时间搬运了这个mod~~不过我把水桶端也弄来了~
新增内容我翻译的是这样
PR5b2新增内容：
增加某些成就；
水泵系统支持BC石油；
对加强铁路和更多矿车的矿车支持度增加；
（苔石上的）苔藓可以蔓延（？）；
可回收线缆，装备，工具等；
点火器可激活/关闭传送门；
分拣机的输出采用独立缓冲；
增加多种金属颗粒。
